prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a senior non-binary person with brown skin, tied hair, showing a clear anger facial expression (brows furrowed in anger), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, Rembrandt lighting, high dynamic range, 8k master
